item.title: What is Experience Engineering?
item.description: What is experience engineering? OK, so I know I just said that it’s an actual term. It’s a term that I’ve kind of made up. It is, however, composed of real things that all revolve around designing and building experiences. More than just user interface It’s easy to default to “…oh you mean UI, right?” when talking about engineering experiences. The reality, however, is the term ‘UI’ means more than a browser-based application.
